review: I like it a lot. The only thing keeping me from giving it 5 stars isn't even Amazons Fire Stick TVs problem. The issue lies within the SLING TV player included in the fire stick. The sling tv is still a little glitchey. even with a great Internet connection on other WiFi devices, the sling player needs to buffer a lot. The picture does get really pixelated once the picture does finally come back. It plays the Amazon Instant Videos perfectly fine.

review: It works pretty good.  The downside is that even when it's receiving a strong signal.  Four to five bars it's ability to send back ( it's radio) is not very strong.  Placement is critical.
